avsc2avdl issue2866.avsc
stderr '^issue2866\.avsc: WARNING: default value \("RED"\) for enum-valued field in R\.col will be ignored'
cmp stdout expect.avdl
-- expect.avdl --
protocol _ {
	record R {
		Color col = "RED";
	}

	enum Color {
		RED,
		BLUE
	}
}
-- issue2866.avsc --
{
  "type" : "record",
  "name" : "R",
  "fields" : [ {
    "name" : "col",
    "default": "RED",
    "type" : {
      "type" : "enum",
      "name" : "Color",
      "symbols" : [ "RED", "BLUE" ]
    }
  } ]
}
